title: mri_cvs_check
description: Checks whether the files required for mri_cvs_register all exist.

mov_subjid.title: Moving Subject ID
mov_subjid.description: Subject id for the subject to be moved/registered (Should be present in SUBJECTS_DIR).

template_subjid.title: Template Subject ID
template_subjid.description: Subject id for the template subject to be kept fixed. If missing, CVS template is assumed as a target.

hemi.title: Hemisphere
hemi.description: The hemisphere that is going to be processed. It can be 'lh' or 'rh'.
